properties.description: Creating HR_Personnel_Sub_Area view for PBI Reports

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_personnel_sub_area

AS
SELECT
CASE
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P105' THEN 1
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P110' THEN 2
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P115' THEN 3
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P120' THEN 4
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P155' THEN 5
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P205' THEN 6
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P210' THEN 7
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P115' THEN 8
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P220' THEN 9
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P225' THEN 10
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P230' THEN 11
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P235' THEN 12
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P240' THEN 13
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P245' THEN 14
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P255' THEN 15
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P260' THEN 16
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P305' THEN 17
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P310' THEN 18
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P315' THEN 19
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P355' THEN 20
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P405' THEN 21
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P410' THEN 22
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P415' THEN 23
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P420' THEN 24
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P425' THEN 25
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P435' THEN 26
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P440' THEN 27
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P501' THEN 28
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P505' THEN 29
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P510' THEN 30
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P515' THEN 31
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P520' THEN 32
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P601' THEN 33
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P605' THEN 34
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P610' THEN 35
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P615' THEN 36
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P620' THEN 37
    WHEN PersonnelSubAreaCode = 'P630' THEN 38
    ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
END AS PersonnelSubAreaKey,
PersonnelSubAreaCode    AS PersonnelSubAreaCode,
Description             AS PersonnelSubAreaDesc--,
--IsActive                AS IsActive,
--IngestionDate           AS IngestionDate,
--ValidTo                 AS ValidTo

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim

ORDER BY PersonnelSubAreaKey ASC

%%sql
create or replace table odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_personnel_sub_area
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_mipins_hr_personnel_sub_area
